edu.salleurl.profile

Interface Profileable


  • public interface Profileable
    This interface stablishes the minimum getters a class should implement for it to represent an entity that can have an associated profile.

    In particular, the Profile class is able to generate HTMl profiles for any class implementing this interface.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    DPOO 20-21 Team

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getBirthdate()
      Provides any class generating a profile with the entity's birthdate.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Provides any class generating a profile with the entity's name.
      java.lang.String getNickname()
      Provides any class generating a profile with the entity's nickname.
      java.lang.String getPictureUrl()
      Provides any class generating a profile with a link to the entity's picture.

    • Method Detail

      • getBirthdate

        java.lang.String getBirthdate()
        Provides any class generating a profile with the entity's birthdate.

        It's strongly recommended (though not mandatory) that a class implementing this interface stores the information as a Date and leaves the formatting to this method.

        Returns:
        a string representation of the entity's birthdate

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Provides any class generating a profile with the entity's name.
        Returns:
        a string representation of the entity's full name

      • getNickname

        java.lang.String getNickname()
        Provides any class generating a profile with the entity's nickname.
        Returns:
        a string representation of the entity's nickname or artistic name

      • getPictureUrl

        java.lang.String getPictureUrl()
        Provides any class generating a profile with a link to the entity's picture.

        It's strongly recommended (though not mandatory) that a class implementing this interface stores the information as a URL and leaves the conversion to this method.

        Returns:
        a string representation of the entity's birthdate
